nodes.text: Jerwo Vhob was a male Sullustan pilot residing on Rishi during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY, Vhob flew a group of independent operatives to Razorback Island, where the Order of Revan had set up a signal jammer.
Jerwo Vhob appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the starting NPC for the Battle of Rishi Flashpoint.
